name: BotCade 2
description:
First person shooter for #7DFPS Game Jam. You need a friend to play this game.

Currently available:

9 Unique weapons to choose from
Power-ups; jetpack, shield and med-kit

How to play:

WASD+Mouse
Left click to shoot, right click to aim (where available)
Space to jump, hols space to use jetpack (if availabel)
Energy is used to keep power-ups active
